response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item carries a value of $1,000,000 to us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and potential impact. We are excited to offer it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. We believe this is a fair and advantageous opportunity for both parties. Should you be interested, please let us know promptly so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
